item.description:
Still on the fence about participating in the Minilympics?  Already have a team and want to size up the competition?

Immediately following the Opening Ceremony, all are invited (even if you aren't participating in the games) to attend our Minilympic Social.  For a couple hours, teams will show off their flags, backstories and other cultural artifacts and we will explore some of the games the participants will be playing.  If you have any questions about any part of this thing, I will answer them as well.  Light refreshments will be served.

This will also be your last chance to talk to people in person and decide if you want to participate or not.  (Yes, some people will be allowed to sign up after the registration deadline, I will send out more information about that later this week).

In any event, come on down for some socializing and game demoing!  Hope to see you there. :-)

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: The Minilympic Social
